segments.text: Good morning . Vane Theater , at your service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I'm thinking about watching a Chinese traditional opera with a foreign girl . What's on this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there will be charity performance on Saturday night . And also , there will be a solo concert by an opera star on Sunday night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a good thing that I have choices here . Can you tell me about the one on Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . It's to raise money for the homeless .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's a reserved opera named The Monkey Creates Havoc in Heaven .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , a story about the clever Monkey King . It's a classic and children's favorite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It surely is . And the cast is really the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful ! How much is the ticket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The price varies according to the seats . 300 for the front , 200 for the middle , and 50 for the back .
segments.speaker: S1
